text: He has given to you the ( same ) law of religion which He had enjoined on Noah; and that which We communicated to you and that which We enjoined on Abraham and Moses and Jesus ( are also the same), that: “Establish the religion and do not be divided therein.” Hard on the polytheists is that which you invite them to. God chooses for Himself whom He wills and guides towards Himself, him who turns ( to Him)
